items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: shadow-form-handler, the ultimate toolkit for effortless form handling and validation in JavaScript and TypeScript! Whether you're building simple forms or complex multi-step processes, our lightweight library empowers you to create seamless user experiences with minimal code.
items.title: Mostafashadow1/shadow-form-handler: shadow-form-handler, the ultimate toolkit for effortless form handling and validation in JavaScript and TypeScript! Whether you're building simple forms or complex multi-step processes, our lightweight library empowers you to create seamless user experiences with minimal code.

items.title: FRSOURCE/FRS-hide-scrollbar: Easy & lightweight solution for cross-browser scrollbar hiding. Built for performance & minimal package size.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A lightweight wrapper over fetch with zero race conditions by default, and everything you'd yearn for in a fetching library like timeouts, retries, interceptors and so much more

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.
items.title: raw-leak/rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.

items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
